mosparams.name: Query Descriptions Parameter File
mosparams.author: Green Mountain Information Technology Consulting
mosparams.copyright: This component is released under the GNU/GPL License
mosparams.description: Description definitions for a query object.

param.name: @spacer
param.label: General Language Settings
param.description: These settings determine what and how descriptions will appear on the various DBQ screens.

param.name: GENERAL_DESCRIPTION
param.label: General Description
param.description: A description of the query that will appear on most pages.

param.name: DEFAULT_LANGUAGE
param.label: Default Language
param.description: The language in which these descriptions are written. If no value is specified, the Joomla default is used.

param.name: GENERAL_DESCRIPTION_LANG_CODE
param.label: General Description Language Code
param.description: This language code will be used when the user's language is not the language defined above.

param.name: DISPLAY_NAME_LANG_CODE
param.label: Display Name Language Code
param.description: This language code will be used to display the name of the query when the user's language is not the query's language.

param.name: @spacer
param.label: Query Form Descriptions
param.description: Descriptions that will appear on the Query From.

param.name: PREPARE_DESCRIPTION_ABOVE
param.label: Form Page, Top
param.description: Text that will appear above the form.

param.name: PREPARE_DESCRIPTION_ABOVE_LANG_CODE
param.label: Language Code
param.description: This language code will be used when the user's language is not the language defined above.

param.name: PREPARE_DESCRIPTION_BELOW
param.label: Form Page, Bottom
param.description: Text that will appear below the form.

param.name: PREPARE_DESCRIPTION_BELOW_LANG_CODE
param.label: Language Code
param.description: This language code will be used when the user's language is not the language defined above.

param.name: @spacer
param.label: Query Results Descriptions
param.description: Descriptions that will appear on the Query Results view.

param.name: EXECUTE_DESCRIPTION_ABOVE
param.label: Result Page, Top
param.description: Text that will appear above a listing of results.

param.name: EXECUTE_DESCRIPTION_ABOVE_LANG_CODE
param.label: Language Code
param.description: This language code will be used when the user's language is not the language defined above.

param.name: EXECUTE_DESCRIPTION_BELOW
param.label: Result Page, Bottom
param.description: Text that will appear below a listing of results.

param.name: EXECUTE_DESCRIPTION_BELOW_LANG_CODE
param.label: Language Code
param.description: This language code will be used when the user's language is not the language defined above.

param.name: EXECUTE_DESCRIPTION_NO_RESULTS
param.label: No Results Found Page
param.description: Text displayed when results are expected but none are found.

param.name: EXECUTE_DESCRIPTION_NO_RESULTS_LANG_CODE
param.label: Language Code
param.description: This language code will be used when the user's language is not the language defined above.

param.name: EXECUTE_DESCRIPTION_WO_RESULTS
param.label: No Results Expected Page
param.description: Text displayed when no results are expected.

param.name: EXECUTE_DESCRIPTION_WO_RESULTS_LANG_CODE
param.label: Language Code
param.description: This language code will be used when the user's language is not the language defined above.

param.name: EXECUTE_DESCRIPTION_ERROR
param.label: Error Page
param.description: Text that is displayed when an error occurs.

param.name: EXECUTE_DESCRIPTION_ERROR_LANG_CODE
param.label: Language Code
param.description: This language code will be used when the user's language is not the language defined above.
